I think this would be a really confusing API. Do I need to pass both the state dict and state tree? Why aren't they exclusive arguments? When do I pick one or another?

I don't think it's worth adding this in here, just so that we can keep things simple. load_state_dict isn't meant to be a general super powerful network transforming function, but to restore the state to what state_dict returned.

Anyway, thanks a lot for the PR, but please discuss such changes with us in an issue before you send it!

body:
I think this would be a really confusing API. Do I need to pass both the state dict and state tree? Why aren't they exclusive arguments? When do I pick one or another?

I don't think it's worth adding this in here, just so that we can keep things simple. `load_state_dict` isn't meant to be a general super powerful network transforming function, but to restore the state to what `state_dict` returned.

Anyway, thanks a lot for the PR, but please discuss such changes with us in an issue before you send it!
